title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Complete the calculations and simulations for rocket propulsion mechanisms.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze the combustion process within a rocket engine using provided data sets.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a nozzle capable of maximizing efficiency based on the given parameters.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Quiz covering the fundamentals of aerodynamics.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze airflow over an aircraft wing using CFD software.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Evaluate the heating effects on spacecraft during re-entry into Earth's atmosphere.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a structural component for a satellite that meets specified criteria.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Perform orbital calculations for a planned satellite mission.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Exam on the principles of systems engineering as applied to aerospace projects.
